page.title: 09SOCIAL ACTIVITIES, BROMPTON
page.content: Some people think that villages are quiet places and that nothing goes on in a village! When we looked at the social activities we have in Brompton we thought a lot goes on. We have a church, a sunday school, a Primary School, a Special School,a pub, a gourmet restaurant, Brownies, Cubs,Scouts and Guides, a football club, a cricket club (which runs 5 teams), a tennis court, keep fit class, dominoes and darts teams, a local history society, a W.I.,a gardening club, a pony club, Mother's union, Over sixties club, a Conservative association and an evening group. We have a village fete day, village sports, church garden fetes, village barbecue, Derwent Hunt Fayre and a Garden show annually. There is never a dull moment here!
